comments:
I20051123-1200

Steps:
1. create fresh workspace
2. checkout any project from CVS
3. open a file
4. Compare With > Revision
5. Select a revision which contains at least one change
6. move the change from rigth to left (click icon in compare editor)
7. close editor
==> toast: NPE are thrown now all the time

Adding Michael to check whether the original cause for this problem might be CVS.
Replace With > Revision is also affected.
I can't say with 100% certaintly that CVS is not doing something that is causing the failure. However, we haven't changed any code in this area so it is far more likely that the problem is elsewhere.

There was a bug in the EventDrivenManager (now called EventManager).  It has already been fixed as of the 22nd of November (but after the integration build).  The fix will appear in the nightly builds, and in next week's integration build.
